statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT review_text, rating_score, review_date FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT guest_id, rating_score FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating_score = 5 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT guest_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE guest_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating_score > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_id, rating_score FROM feedback_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' AND review_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT guest_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY guest_id HAVING review_count > 2 ORDER BY review_count DESC;
SELECT avg(rating_score) AS average_rating, DATE_TRUNC('month', review_date) AS month FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE guest_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND review_text ILIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE guest_id = '123abc';
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2021-01-01' AND review_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT review_text FROM reviews WHERE guest_id = '456def';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE guest_id = 'abc123' AND rating >= 4;
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM GuestFeedback;
SELECT guest_id, rating FROM GuestFeedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM GuestDetails WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT improvement_description FROM ServiceImprovements WHERE implemented = FALSE;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM GuestDetails ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GuestFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM GuestFeedback JOIN GuestDetails ON GuestFeedback.guest_id = GuestDetails.guest_id WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM GuestDetails WHERE guest_id IN (SELECT guest_id FROM GuestFeedback WHERE rating = 5);
SELECT * FROM GuestFeedback INNER JOIN GuestDetails ON GuestFeedback.guest_id = GuestDetails.guest_id WHERE GuestFeedback.rating < 3 AND GuestDetails.guest_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT improvement_description FROM ServiceImprovements WHERE implemented = TRUE ORDER BY improvement_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_email FROM guests WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback JOIN guests ON feedback.guest_id = guests.guest_id;
SELECT feedback_id, guest_name, rating, comments FROM feedback JOIN guests ON feedback.guest_id = guests.guest_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT guest_name, rating FROM guests JOIN feedback ON guests.guest_id = feedback.guest_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT service_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback JOIN services ON feedback.service_id = services.service_id GROUP BY service_name;
SELECT feedback_id, review_date FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, timestamp FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, guest_phone FROM guests WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_cost FROM services WHERE service_cost > 100;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position, employee_salary FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM guests;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, guest_email FROM guests ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position, employee_salary FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT department_id, department_name, department_description FROM departments ORDER BY department_name ASC;
